title: Pizza Shop
description: A fictitious Pizza company has allowed me to make a website with React. This site demonstrates cart functionality with Redux as well as a great interactive pizza maker, be sure to check it out!

title: Kemplet
description: Project manager web app. Utilizes Firebase user authentication and database CRUD operations.

title: Coffee Shop
description: A coffee shop that utilizes a CMS for food items and has an ordering system with MobX.

title: Loaned
description: Keep track of who owes what. This web app allows users to type in text and have it converted into a money management system.

title: Taskmaster
description: A web app that utilizes Google Map services. With this web app, you can use it as a todo list that has addresses attached to the task. When it's time to plan the day, the API will help determine the most efficient route to get the day done.

title: Pokedex
description: Simple web app that calls to a hosted Apollo Server with Pokemon data. Utilizes SSR features from Next.js.
